General.Name: Nila Infrastructures Limited
General.Description: Nila Infrastructures Limited constructs and develops infrastructure and real estate projects in India. The company is involved in the construction of civic urban infrastructure projects, including bus stations, multilevel parking, medical college, bus port, office complex, community hall, and other projects. It also develops residential real estate properties, such as flats and apartments; and leases commercial properties. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
